channel.title: RuneScape Post Report
channel.description:
Can everyone please go ahead and post and support this, because it's really irritating and annoying.
Hey JaGeX, [b]Inventory - Right Click[/b] So, as everyone is probably aware. When you right click on an empty Inventory slot it gives you the options to select your 'Quick-Inventory' Slot. Can you please remove it, so when you right click it doesn't give you any options like before. It is better if you add it to the left-click option so it doesn't stuff us up when we're bossing and stuff. I've died, and my friends have died a many times from this and it's starting to get really irritating and it's pretty silly as it should be a left-click option as it is for a 'setting'. [b]Inventory - Drag-Drop[/b] So, when you drag an Item on the screen from your Inventory it will drop it. My friend lost 300,000 Dust Runes at Vorago, and my other friend lost a Drygore Rapier at Kalphite King. This needs to be fixed and a little pop-up added to confirm you want to drop it, just like if you were to drop them with the correct 'Drop Option'. Note: If normal players, and moderators can support this it will most probably be changed. Thanks for reading, vQorx.
Link: [url=http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=vyXp*KPiRDY/forums.ws?74,75,559,65164496,0,327826515,#0]Post Link[/url]. QFC: 74-75-559-65164496

item.title: RuneScape Post Report
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:7, topic:532716”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=651505.msg4369072#msg4369072 date=1380238180]
I stopped giving Jagex feedback on useful things after they stopped listening to their player base… about 5+ years ago.
[/quote]
I don’t think having an oldschool server was entirely Jagex’s idea. ;)[/quote]
Was that before or after Jagex lost 90% of its community? Pretty sure it was after, and yet again it was just another money squeeze. However, I suppose you are correct. They pretty much got one thing right in 5 years.

I was speaking more along the lines of in-game content though.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Post Report
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Can everyone please go ahead and post and support this, because it’s really irritating and annoying.

Hey JaGeX,

Inventory - Right Click
So, as everyone is probably aware. When you right click on an empty Inventory slot it gives you the options to select your ‘Quick-Inventory’ Slot. Can you please remove it, so when you right click it doesn’t give you any options like before. It is better if you add it to the left-click option so it doesn’t stuff us up when we’re bossing and stuff. I’ve died, and my friends have died a many times from this and it’s starting to get really irritating and it’s pretty silly as it should be a left-click option as it is for a ‘setting’.

Inventory - Drag-Drop
So, when you drag an Item on the screen from your Inventory it will drop it. My friend lost 300,000 Dust Runes at Vorago, and my other friend lost a Drygore Rapier at Kalphite King. This needs to be fixed and a little pop-up added to confirm you want to drop it, just like if you were to drop them with the correct ‘Drop Option’.

Note: If normal players, and moderators can support this it will most probably be changed.

Thanks for reading,

vQorx.

Link: Post Link.

QFC: 74-75-559-65164496

Read full topic
